frameset.edef: to become straight, become right, honest

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ ثم) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تحدث) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الدكتور) (NOUN_PROP انطوان) (NOUN_PROP مسرة)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN موضوع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اللقاء)))))) (CONJ ف) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS رأى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (PUNC ") (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الدول)) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تستقيم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-TMP (-NONE- *RNR*-2)))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تصبح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ديموقراطية)) (NP-TMP (-NONE- *RNR*-2)))) (NP-TMP-2 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عند) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يطالب) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM المواطنون)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حقوق) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يشاركون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN التزامات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطنية))))))))))))) (PUNC ") (PUNC .))

arg.g: -NONE- < when the citizens demand their rights and participate * in their national obligations.

example.arg: *RNR*-2 < ند ما يطالب المواطنون ب حقوق هم و يشاركون * في التزامات هم الوطنية " .
